General.Name: Grupo de Moda SOMA S.A
General.Description: Grupo de Moda SOMA S.A. manufactures and sells clothing products in Brazil. The company operates through stores, as well as an e-commerce site. It offers clothing under the Animale, Farm, Fabula, A.Brand, Foxton, Cris Barros, and Off Premium brands. Grupo de Moda SOMA S.A. was founded in 2010 and is based in Rio De Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Aristides Lobo, 71, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil
